Text:
pirp-
i try to seed at least 2-3 days. i will try and do a bit more, because i love these old movies. thanks for the movies.
unfortunately its true to all of us that do older style files heavy start off hits then drops to verily stay alive  status but its still fun to do

To Alien99 : your comment makes sense of course. At least, we try ... for the pleasure of sharing those gems, and giving a chance to others to discover them. It's just too bad most of the guys don't realize that a small effort from their part could greatly improve the whole game.
